Description:
Item Type: Heavy Armor
Damage Reduction: 40%

Based on CDS' ADP-mk4 heavy combat armor, this set has been modified from its original form. When there's a difficult job at hand, you want to ensure that you can see it through to the end. This  armor allows Marines to remain in active combat situations for a longer duration with more loadout options, while its powered frame provides near unfettered movement despite the protection it offers.
